title: Concord Elementary School (Pittsburgh)
text: Concord Elementary School located at 2340 Brownsville Road in the <a href="Carrick%20%28Pittsburgh%29">Carrick</a> neighborhood of <a href="Pittsburgh%2C%20Pennsylvania">Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania</a>, was built in 1939. It was designed by <a href="Marion%20M.%20Steen">Marion M. Steen</a> (1886–1966) in <a href="Georgian%20Revival%20architecture">Georgian Revival</a> and <a href="Moderne%20architecture">Moderne</a> style. It was added to the <a href="List%20of%20Pittsburgh%20History%20and%20Landmarks%20Foundation%20Historic%20Landmarks">List of Pittsburgh History and Landmarks Foundation Historic Landmarks</a> in 2001, and the <a href="List%20of%20City%20of%20Pittsburgh%20historic%20designations">List of City of Pittsburgh historic designations</a> on November 30, 1999.
